properties.name: 178th Trade Syndicate Conference
properties.legend:
A diplomatic meeting called by the Trade Syndicate. This is the 178th meeting of its 4066-year history (This page also contains the history of the Trade Syndicate). All participating member-nations will discuss the current worldly issues. As discussed in the last meeting of the Trade Syndicate, this conference will be held in the Lauyienese capital of Nic'olu. Though a date has not been released, it is bound to happen soon...

 

Issues in/around the Trade Syndicate pressing discussion:

Terms over The Larien Coalition's proposal over a wartime political agreement

Recent death of the Shi King

Involvement in the Larien Civil Wars

Mathelish occupation of Sam'alsa in Ulbagra'a

Involvement in the growing threat of the War for Suran

properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 90Â°F.

properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 90Â°F.

properties.name: Dinguktsen Healing Spring
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Dudgehone Monster
properties.legend: Rumors say a relic monster of 10 ft long inhabits Dudgehone Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Mushadyah Archive
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Extraordinary Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this extraordinary circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Incomprehensible Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this incomprehensible circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Breathtaking Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this breathtaking circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling World-famous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this world-famous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Breathtaking Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this breathtaking circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Irenor Joust
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a joust of speed in Irenor, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Damahmah Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Damahmah, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Ellean River to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Cuervalanil River to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.name: Sheep migration
properties.legend: A huge group of sheep are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Ibises migration
properties.legend: A huge group of ibises are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Herons migration
properties.legend: A huge group of herons are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Hawks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of hawks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Oxen migration
properties.legend: A huge group of oxen are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Cats migration
properties.legend: A huge group of cats are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Owls migration
properties.legend: A huge group of owls are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Arreriazura performance
properties.legend: A performance has been organised at Arreriazura as a chance to gather the suspected revolutionaries of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis.

properties.name: Diaphanous mirage
properties.legend: This diaphanous mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Entrancing mirage
properties.legend: This entrancing mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Ishe Cave
properties.legend: The Ishe Cave. Locals claim that it is the home of strange monsters.

properties.name: Ruthuph Chasm
properties.legend: The Ruthuph Chasm. Locals claim that it is endlessly deep and unexplored.

properties.name: Amrah Crypt
properties.legend: An eerie necropolis where nature intertwines with death. Overgrown tombstones are entwined by thorny vines, and mournful spirits wander among the fading petals of once-vibrant flowers

properties.name: Kefrost Tomb
properties.legend: This cursed necropolis is veiled in perpetual twilight, perpetuating a sense of impending doom. Dark enchantments shroud the tombs, and the moans of anguished souls resound through its crumbling halls

properties.name: Kekosahe Mausoleum
properties.legend: This cursed necropolis is veiled in perpetual twilight, perpetuating a sense of impending doom. Dark enchantments shroud the tombs, and the moans of anguished souls resound through its crumbling halls

properties.name: Pongal Tomb
properties.legend: A towering necropolis adorned with macabre sculptures and guarded by formidable undead sentinels. Its ancient halls house the remains of fallen heroes, entombed alongside their cherished relics

properties.name: Iuresiumbia Graveyard
properties.legend: A desolate necropolis where an eerie stillness reigns. Time seems frozen amidst the decaying mausoleums, and the silence is broken only by the whispers of the wind and the rustle of tattered banners

properties.name: Purmuran Crypt
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis shrouded in perpetual darkness, where eerie whispers echo through the winding corridors and spectral guardians stand watch over the tombs of long-forgotten souls

properties.name: Bjorvi Tomb
properties.legend: Rising from the desolate landscape, this sinister necropolis is a testament to necromantic power. Its skeletal spires cast ominous shadows, concealing forbidden knowledge and arcane secrets

properties.name: The Ol'viirian Academy
properties.legend: Centered in the educational capital of the realm, the Ol'viirian Academy is the legacy of its namesake: the great wizard Ol'viirs of Yethsari, the First Archmage of the Mage Council. Not centralizing on one particular school of practice, this academy focuses more on higher learning in magical fields. More recently, the school has begun to teach and accept bards as students, allowing them to practice their unique magical potentials.

properties.name: Ellerion School of Abjuration
properties.legend: The Ellerion School of Abjuration is built along the coasts of the North Eslan Basin, with a town established around it. Built prior to Esla splitting, it became a famous and popular option for Eslan wizards. Nowadays, it teaches students from across the realm. Third Archmage Tavha of Salaglen, renowned for repairing the reputation of the Mage Council following the actions of the Second Archmage, studied here.

properties.name: Cesalium School of Conjuration
properties.legend: A more popular option with younger spellcasters, the Cesalium School of Conjuration is a school built by Ol'viirs at the height of his success. The construction prompted promising wizards in the region to seek further study at the school and soon became a regional center for magic. Later, the Mage Council would use this as a regional center as well.
